project_info.prompt: Design employee onboarding with document verification and training schedules

system.name: Employee Onboarding Management System
system.description: A system to manage the onboarding process of new employees, including document verification and training scheduling.

sheets.name: Employees
sheets.description: Stores master data of employees being onboarded.

columns.name: employee_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for an employee

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: The first name of the employee

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: The last name of the employee

columns.name: email
columns.description: The email address of the employee

columns.name: start_date
columns.description: The employment start date

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: The date the employee record was created

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: The date the employee record was last modified

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of employee onboarding

sheets.name: Document Verification
sheets.description: Tracks the verification status of necessary documents for onboarding.

columns.name: verification_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a document verification record

columns.name: employee_id
columns.description: Link to the employee being verified

columns.name: document_type
columns.description: Type of document being verified (e.g., ID, contract)

columns.name: verification_status
columns.description: Status of the document verification

columns.name: verified_date
columns.description: Date when the document was verified

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Date the verification record was created

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: Date the verification record was last modified

sheets.name: Training Schedule
sheets.description: Manages the training schedule and status for new employees.

columns.name: schedule_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a training schedule record

columns.name: employee_id
columns.description: Link to the employee enrolled in the training

columns.name: training_program
columns.description: Name of the training program

columns.name: start_date
columns.description: Start date of the training

columns.name: end_date
columns.description: End date of the training

columns.name: completion_status
columns.description: Status of training completion

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Date the training schedule was created

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: Date the training schedule was last modified

sheets.name: Onboarding Process Tracking
sheets.description: Tracks the overall status and stages of the onboarding process.

columns.name: process_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for an onboarding process record

columns.name: employee_id
columns.description: Link to the employee undergoing onboarding

columns.name: current_stage
columns.description: Current stage of the onboarding process

columns.name: approval_status
columns.description: Approval status of the current stage

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Date the process tracking was initiated

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: Date the tracking record was last updated
